trans-unit.source: Controls the.NET remoting lifetime services.
trans-unit.target: 控制 .NET 遠端存留期服務。

trans-unit.source: Distributed garbage collection is responsible for controlling the lifetimes of server applications, and for deleting them when their lifetimes have expired.
trans-unit.target: 分散式記憶體回收是負責控制的存留期伺服器應用程式，以及它們的存留期間已過期時加以刪除。

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control.
trans-unit.target: 傳統上，分散式記憶體回收會使用參考計數和控制的 ping。

trans-unit.source: This works well when there are a few clients per object, but does not work well when there are thousands of clients per each object.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於時有一些用戶端，每個物件，但有數千個用戶端，每一個物件時，也無法運作。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service can assume the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and scales well when the number of clients increases.
trans-unit.target: 存留時間服務的用戶端數目增加時，也就可以假設傳統的分散式記憶體回收行程，與縮放比例的函式。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime service associates a lease with each remotely activated object.
trans-unit.target: 與每個遠端啟動物件存留期服務產生關聯的租用。

trans-unit.source: When the lease expires, the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: 當租用已到期時，則會移除物件。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓連結要求。

trans-unit.source: A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission Value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval between each activation of the lease manager to clean up expired leases.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用期管理員在各個啟動過程 (Activation) 之間要清除過期使用期的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The default amount of time the lease manager sleeps after checking for expired leases.
trans-unit.target: 使用期管理員在檢查過期的使用期之後會睡眠的預設時間數量。

trans-unit.source: The current property defines the frequency at which the lease manager becomes active to clean up expired leases.
trans-unit.target: 目前的屬性定義的租用管理員會變成使用中，清除已過期的租用的頻率。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.LeaseManagerPollTime%2A> is set to 100 seconds, the lease list is inspected for cleanups and renewals every 100 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.LeaseManagerPollTime%2A>設為 100 秒，租用清單會檢查清除間隔和更新每隔 100 秒。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.LeaseManagerPollTime%2A> property is 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.LifetimeServices.LeaseManagerPollTime%2A>屬性為 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一個呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，不具有設定遠端類型和通道的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown only when setting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 只有在設定屬性值時才會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端執行功能基礎結構的設定。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial lease time span for an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 的初始使用期時間間距。

trans-unit.source: The initial lease <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> for objects that can have leases in the <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 可以擁有使用期的物件的初始使用期 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />。

trans-unit.source: The default lease time span is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設的租用時間範圍為 5 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一個呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，不具有設定遠端類型和通道的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown only when setting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 只有在設定屬性值時才會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端執行功能基礎結構的設定。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time by which the lease is extended every time a call comes in on the server object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每次呼叫來到伺服器物件時要據以延長使用期的時間數量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> by which a lifetime lease in the current <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> is extended after each call.
trans-unit.target: 在每一個呼叫之後要據以延長目前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 中的存留期使用期的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />。

trans-unit.source: The default renewal time by which a lifetime lease is extended is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設之延伸的存留期租用的更新時間為 2 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一個呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，不具有設定遠端類型和通道的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown only when setting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 只有在設定屬性值時才會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端執行功能基礎結構的設定。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time the lease manager waits for a sponsor to return with a lease renewal time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用期管理員等候贊助者傳回使用期的更新時間所需要的時間量數。

trans-unit.source: The initial sponsorship time-out.
trans-unit.target: 初始贊助逾時。

trans-unit.source: The default time until a call to a sponsor is timed out is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 直到贊助者的呼叫逾時的預設時間為 2 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一個呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端，不具有設定遠端類型和通道的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown only when setting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 只有在設定屬性值時才會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端執行功能基礎結構的設定。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.RemotingConfiguration" />
